title: lag?
body: is anyone having problems with lag tonight? mine keeps jumping from my normal 75ms to like 400ms and its all random. no one in my house is downloading anything so i dont know what the problem is. any help would be great.

replies.body:
Big jumps in latency are often caused by either local network issues or issues along your ISP routing to the server. As a first step, I recommend ensuring your local settings are up to spec with our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you notice any changes to your latency after taking those steps.
